p: The data were statistically analyzed and visualized by using GraphPad Prism version 8.1. The results were presented as the mean ± SD (standard deviation) of triplicates. Differences between two groups were analyzed using the Student’s unpaired t-test for gene expression and the Dunnett’s multiple comparisons test for luciferase activity. p values less than 0.05 ( p < 0.05) were considered as statistically significant.
